MainHeading.P: Chuaigh an Ceann Comhairle i gceannas ar 2.30 p.m.

Speaker.P: Before proceeding I would like to give a very warm welcome to Dáil Éireann to the President of the European Parliament, Mr. José Maria Gil-Robles, MEP, and to the members of his delegation who are here today in the Distinguished Visitors Gallery. On my behalf and on behalf of the Members of Dáil Éireann, I extend to you, Mr. President, a most sincere welcome to our country. I hope you will find your visit to Ireland interesting, successful and to our mutual benefit.

MainHeading.Title: Ceisteanna—Questions. - Northern Ireland Peace Process.

Qst.hpid: Mr. J. Bruton Mr. J. Bruton

Qst.hpid: Mr. Higgins (Dublin West) Mr. Higgins (Dublin West)
